backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report listing implemented features and the files involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining variables for backend canister ID and optional IC network config.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DRAFT_LINK.md: Guide explaining deployment steps and how to verify the app’s shareable URL and canister ID resolution.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind layer defining OKLCH color variables and global theming utilities.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Entry component that renders the ValentineFlow.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Candid IDL factory defining an empty backend service.
frontend/src/canisterId.ts: Utility functions to resolve backend canister ID and network host from environment variables.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Music control button handling playback, autoplay attempts, and audio load errors.
Envelope component triggering an unfold animation and notifying parent when opened.
Renders animated falling heart elements driven by the useFallingHearts hook.
Canvas scratch-off component that initializes a gradient overlay and detects completion when enough area is scratched.
Navigation buttons that move between previous and next Valentine flow screens.
GIF display component with error fallback, keyboard accessibility, and optional click handling.
Centered card-style layout wrapper for Valentine screens.
frontend/src/features/valentine/content/: Central asset list containing GIF URLs, local fallbacks, and music used across Valentine screens.
Defines sequential screen flow and helpers to get previous and next screens.
All text and labels for Valentine UI, including quiz questions and fallback messages.
frontend/src/features/valentine/effects/: Hook to manage custom GIF URLs with validation, previewing, persistence, and reset.
Generates falling heart animations by spawning and removing heart objects over time.
Creates a short glitter burst effect by generating temporary particle positions.
Produces clustered kiss animations in timed bursts with automatic cleanup.
Triggers scattered kiss animations over a short period with timed cleanup.
Typewriter effect hook that reveals text line by line and tracks completion.
frontend/src/features/valentine/screens/: Displays a list of four gift buttons with a GIF and handles navigation to each gift screen.
Shows a congratulations message with a GIF and a button to navigate to the gifts screen.
Shows a cuddle/hug-themed GIF and message with back/next navigation.
Displays a final surprise GIF and clickable box that reveals a message with glitter burst effects.
Implements a multi‑question quiz with feedback, GIFs, and navigation to the next gift when completed.
Shows a GIF and an envelope that opens to a typed love letter with a typewriter effect.
Displays a memories‑themed GIF and message with a return‑to‑gifts button.
Provides a scratch‑off heart component that triggers kiss burst particles when completed.
Implements a spinning reward wheel with limited attempts, animation, and a summary of earned rewards.
Empty placeholder file for a success screen.
Shows a welcome message with a GIF and button to begin the Valentine flow.
React screen showing a Valentine prompt with customizable GIF, dialog for entering a new GIF URL, and Yes/No buttons where No enlarges the Yes button.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Screen flow controller switching between all Valentine app screens with falling hearts and music.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS with Valentine-themed OKLCH colors plus custom components and animations like envelope/letter effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and responsive settings using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s feature requirements, issues, and update plans for Valentine site interactions.
